title: InterFace
content:
I'm trolling for opinions about [InterFace](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005021/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/fonts/exclusives/intro.html) by Daalton Maag. I happened across it recently and find it quite attractive. What do other Typophiles think?   
   
 -t
author: timfm

comments.content:
Tim - I have never used Interface so I can't really give a proper opinion on it.   
   
However I have used Bruno Maag a few times in the past (London Eye, FIBA etc) - they are professional and come highly recommended.

Tim - I have never used Interface so I can't really give a proper opinion on it.   
   
However I have used Bruno Maag a few times in the past (London Eye, FIBA etc) - they are professional and come highly recommended.

InterFace is absolutely beautiful. The hinting on the TrueType is superb and it looks first class on-screen.   
   
I use InterFace Regular throughout my portfolio site, Leftofsix.   
   
 [www.leftofsix.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005021/http:/www.leftofsix.com/)

Hi Colin,   
   
You have a very website. I like your music. Why is it that graphic designers always are interested in electronic music?   
My collegue makes also his own music under the name Ballet Mechanique. We both like the same kind of intelligent techno.   
   
Keep up the great work.   
   
Cheers,   
Ren

I'm strictly a Goa man myself.   
   
hhp
